description: This Dart script performs continuous integration (CI) tasks for a Flutter project. It verifies the presence of 'pubspec.yaml' in the current directory, then runs a sequence of Flutter commands: 'flutter --version', 'flutter pub get', 'flutter analyze', and 'flutter test --coverage' to ensure the project build and tests are successful.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main asynchronous function that orchestrates the CI steps, verifying the project setup and running Flutter commands.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Helper function to execute shell commands asynchronously, outputting logs and handling errors by terminating the script upon failure.
